item.title: About me
item.author: pawangaria@gmail.com (Pawan garia)
item.description: My name is Pawan Garia and these days I am living in Germany with my wife in a beautiful city of Bamberg. I am working as QA Automation Engineer and I have lots of experience in Framework Design and Development. In my free time I like watching movies, travelling to new places and adventure sports. Please feel free to contact me on my Email: pawangaria@gmail.com
